description:
go.net/html: move exp/html and exp/html/atom here to the go.net
sub-repo.

It's a straight copy, except for these modifications:
* "exp/html" and "exp/html/atom" imports were renamed, and
* the "TODO... When this package moves out of exp" comment was
  deleted from atom/atom.go.

The matching change is at https://codereview.appspot.com/7317043

The rationale was discussed at
https://groups.google.com/d/topic/golang-nuts/Qq5hTQyPuLg/discussion

messages.text:
Hello adg@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.net

On 2013/2/8  <nigeltao@golang.org> wrote:
> Description:
> go.net/html: move exp/html and exp/html/atom here to the go.net
> sub-repo.

What is the rationale behind this decision?

Rémy.

Link to discussion:
https://groups.google.com/d/topic/golang-nuts/Qq5hTQyPuLg/discussion

On Fri, Feb 8, 2013 at 11:17 AM, Rémy Oudompheng
<remyoudompheng@gmail.com> wrote:
> On 2013/2/8  <nigeltao@golang.org> wrote:
>> Description:
>> go.net/html: move exp/html and exp/html/atom here to the go.net
>> sub-repo.
>
> What is the rationale behind this decision?
>
> Rémy.
>
> --
>
> ---

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=ffbff9f7596e&repo=net ***
